nio/AttributeSelector.description: The AttributeSelector block is used to whitelist or blacklist incoming signal attributes. The block will alter the signal based on which attributes are allowed and emit the modified signal.

attributes.title: Incoming signal attributes
attributes.description: Incoming signal attributes to ignore or allow depending on whether whitelist or blacklist is chosen as the Selector Mode.

default.description: The input list of signals but with modified attributes depending on whitelist/blacklist selections.
